column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////Great vibe/atmosphere and crowed. Service excellent
column3: had great beer selection. I got the BossCat press
column4: a Texas version of a Cuban sandwich. Which in my opinion is what a Cuban sandwich should be! Theirs is a delicious pulled pork
column8: far better than what I get in Miami (where I live) where they basically serve a ham sandwich with pickles dry as hell and bland. Also the Latin bartender provide great scenery Â so sexy
column9: love the tats and arms! And all " the rest"
column10: censoring details in case my mom reads this review.
